#summary How to use the program.

= Introduction =

The program can be used as part of a pipe to transport IP over DVB links (e.g. satellite).

= Details =

Example use:

In one terminal:

`mpe tun0 | dvbsnoop -if -`

In another Terminal:

`ifconfig tun0 10.0.0.1/24 up`

`nc -u 10.0.0.2 16000`
